name: Modules.BLE.Service
summary: A collection of data and associated behaviors that accomplish a function or feature of a device.

properties.name: characteristics
properties.summary: A list of characteristics discovered in this service.

properties.name: includedServices
properties.summary: A list of included services discovered in this service.

properties.name: isPrimary
properties.summary: A Boolean value that indicates whether the type of service is primary or secondary.

properties.name: peripheral
properties.summary: The peripheral to which this service belongs.
